summary:
Max all skills to 100 to get to level 252.
This will give you perk points for all 251 perks.
descriptionHtml:
Max all skills to 100 to get to level 252.
This will give you perk points for all 251 perks.

Please note that you will only be able to reach level 252 from starting a new game.
If you use it for your current game, 
The lower your current level & skills, the higher the level you can reach

If you want to test this mod use my Max all Skills Mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21435

Or type the below:
Each command will max the skill.

player.advskill sneak 5000000
player.advskill speechcraft 5000000
player.advskill marksman 5000000
player.advskill alchemy 5000000
player.advskill conjuration 5000000
player.advskill restoration 5000000
player.advskill destruction 5000000
player.advskill illusion 5000000
player.advskill lightarmor 5000000
player.advskill heavyarmor 5000000
player.advskill alteration 5000000
player.advskill smithing 5000000
player.advskill enchanting 5000000
player.advskill pickpocket 5000000
player.advskill block 5000000
player.advskill lockpicking 5000000
player.advskill twohanded 5000000
player.advskill onehanded 5000000

Easier to paste into txt file,
Save as skills.txt
Place file into Data Dir
Go into game console and type: bat skills
Easy done!
author: MontaugeX
